abstract: The two-hour debut of “America’s Got Talent” lifted NBC in the ratings on Tuesday as 12.8 million viewers tuned in from 9 to 11 p.m. to watch the show’s third season get under way, according to Nielsen’s estimates.
lead_paragraph: The two-hour debut of “America’s Got Talent” lifted NBC in the ratings on Tuesday as 12.8 million viewers tuned in from 9 to 11 p.m. to watch the show’s third season get under way, according to Nielsen’s estimates.

headline.main: America May Have Talent, But ABC’s Got Basketball
